naturalRelationshipTendencyPositive.japanese: 自然にポジティブな傾向

naturalRelationshipTendencyNegative.japanese: 自然にネガティブな傾向

tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.english: Once the relationship bar is maxed out and the expectations in the village are fulfilled, the couple will think about having children.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.german: Sobald die Beziehungsleiste am Maximum ist und die Erwartungen im Dorf erfüllt sind, wird das Paar über Kinder nachdenken.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.french: Une fois que la barre de relation est au maximum et que les attentes dans le village sont satisfaites, le couple pensera à avoir des enfants.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.spanish: Una vez que la barra de relación ha llegado al máximo y las expectativas en la aldea están cumplidas, la pareja pensará sobre tener hijos.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.dutch: Zodra de relatie bar maximaal is en de verwachtingen in het dorp zijn ingelost, zal het koppel nadenken over het krijgen van kinderen.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.russian: Как только будет достигнут максимальный уровень отношений и выполнены ожидания жителей, пара начнет думать о возможности завести ребенка.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.portuguese: Uma vez que a barra de relacionamento esteja no limite máximo e as expectativas na vila sejam cumpridas, o casal pensará em ter filhos.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.italian: Una volta che la barra di relazione è massimizzata e le aspettative nel villaggio sono soddisfatte, la coppia penserà ad avere bambini.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.chinese: 一旦关系值达到最大并且满足了村庄的期望，这对夫妇就会考虑生孩子。
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.turkish: İlşki seviye göstergesi dolduğunda ve çiftin yerleşimdeki beklentileri karşılandığında, çocuk yapmayı düşünmeye başlarlar.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.polish: Gdy pasek relacji osiągnie maksimum, a oczekiwania kolonistów zostaną spełnione, para pomyśli o potomstwie.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.japanese: 関係バーが最大に達し、住環境が整えられると子供を授かります。
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.czech: Jakmile je vztahová lišta maximalizována a očekávání ve vesnici jsou splněna tak zamilovaný pár přemýšlí o tom, že bude mít děti.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.korean: 관계 수치가 최대가 되고 모든 거주민들의 기대치가 충족되면, 연인들은 아이 갖는 것에 대해 생각할 것입니다.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.ukrainian: Коли шкалу стосунків буде заповнено, а колоністи будуть задоволені життям у колонії, пара подумає про народження дітей.
tooltipGettingChildren_Desc.hungarian: Mikor teljesen betöltődött a kapcsolati sáv, és a falu szükségletei ki lettek elégítve, a pár elgondolkodhat hogy szeretnének-e gyermeket.

relationship_LoveOfTheirLife.russian: Любит %hisHer% так же, как свою жизнь

relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.english:
%affectedName% is upset with %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% will not talk to %2-himHer% for some time.
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.german:
%affectedName% ist sauer auf %partnerName%. %cap-erSie% wird für eine Weile nicht mit %2-ihmIhr% sprechen.
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.french:
%affectedName% est en colère contre %partnerName%. %cap-ilElle% ne lui parlera pas pendant un certain temps.
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.spanish:
%affectedName% está enojad%oA% con %partnerName%. %cap-élElla% no hablará con %2-élÉlla% por un rato.
(%seconds% segundos restantes)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.dutch:
%affectedName% is van streek van %partnerName%. %cap-hijZij% wil niet tegen %hemHaar% praten voor een tijdje. 
(%seconds% seconden over)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.russian:
%affectedName% обижен%surnameA% на %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% не будет разговаривать с %heShe2% некоторое время.
(%seconds% секунд осталось)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.portuguese:
%affectedName% está chateado com %partnerName%. %cap-eleEla% não conversará com %2-eleEla% por algum tempo. 
(restam %seconds% segundos)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.chinese:
%affectedName% 因 %partnerName%而感到不安。%heShe% 在一段时间内都不与 %2-himHer% 谈话。
(还剩%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.italian:
%affectedName% è arrabbiat%OA% con %partnerName%. Non %GliLe% parlerà per qualche tmepo.
(%seconds% secondi rimasti)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.turkish:
%affectedName%, %partnerName%den dolayı üzgün. Onunla bir süre konuşmayacak.
(%seconds% saniye kaldı)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.japanese:
%affectedName%は%partnerName%に侮辱されました。しばらくの間、口を利きたくありません。
(残り%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.czech:
%affectedName% je naštvan%yA% na %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% nebude mluvit s %2-himHer% po tuto dobu.
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.korean:
%affectedName%#{은} %partnerName%에게 화가 났습니다. %cap-heShe%#{은} %2-himHer%에게 당분간 말 걸지 않을 겁니다.
(%seconds% 초 남음)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.ukrainian:
%affectedName% ображен%heshe_IY_A% на %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% не розмовлятиме із %2-himHer% певний час. 
(Ще протягом %seconds% сек.)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.hungarian:
%affectedName% dühös rá: %partnerName%. Nem beszél vele egy darabig.
(%seconds% másodperc van hátra)

relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.english:
%affectedName% is impressed by %partnerName%. Any positive interaction is twice as effective!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.german:
%affectedName% ist beeindruckt von %partnerName%. Jede positive Interaktion ist doppelt so effektiv!
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.french:
%affectedName% est impressionné%e% par %partnerName%. Toute interaction positive est deux fois plus efficace !
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.spanish:
%affectedName% está impresionad%oA% por %partnerName%. ¡Cualquier interacción positiva es el doble de efectiva!
(%seconds% segundos restantes)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.dutch:
%affectedName% is onder de indruk van %partnerName%. Elke positieve interactie is twee keer zo effectief!
(%seconds% seconden over)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.russian:
%affectedName% впечатлен%surnameA% %partnerName%. Любое положительное взаимодействие станет в два раза эффективнее!
(%seconds% секунд осталось)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.portuguese:
%affectedName% está impressionado com %partnerName%. Qualquer interação positiva é duas vezes mais eficaz! 
(%seconds% segundos restantes)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.chinese:
%affectedName% 对 %partnerName%印象深刻。任何好的互动都是两倍的效果。
(还剩%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.italian:
%affectedName% è impressionat%OA% da %partnerName%. Ogni interazione positiva è due volte più efficace!
(%seconds% secondi rimasti)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.turkish:
%affectedName% %partnerName% tarafından etkilendi. Herhangi bir olumlu etkileşim iki kat daha etkili!
(%seconds% saniye kaldı)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.japanese:
%affectedName%は%partnerName%に誘惑されました。関係が上昇する効果は2倍になります。
(残り%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.czech:
%partnerName% uděla%lA% dojem na %affectedName%. Jakákoli pozitivní interakce je dvakrát tak efektivní!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.korean:
%affectedName% 는  %partnerName%에게 감명 받았습니다. 긍정적인 상호작용이 두배의 효과를 받게 됩니다!
(%seconds% 초 남음)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.ukrainian:
%partnerName% вміє справити враження, %affectedName% просто зачарован%heshe_IY_A%! Будь-які позитивні взаємодії вдвічі ефективніші.
(Ще протягом %seconds% сек.)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.hungarian:
%partnerName% lenyűgözte őt: %affectedName%. Minden pozitív hatás kétszeresére nőtt!
(%seconds% másodperc van hátra)

relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.english:
%affectedName% is not impressed by %partnerName%. Any negative interaction is twice as detrimental!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.german:
%affectedName% ist nicht beeindruckt von %partnerName%. Jede negative Interaktion ist doppelt so schlecht!
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.french:
%affectedName% n'est pas impressionné%e% par %partnerName%. Toute interaction négative est deux fois plus néfaste !
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.spanish:
%affectedName% no está impresionad%oA% por %partnerName%. ¡Cualquier interacción negativa es el doble de perjudicial!
(%seconds% segundos restantes)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.dutch:
%affectedName% is niet onder de indruk van %partnerName%. Elke negatieve interactie is twee keer zo schadelijk!
(%seconds% seconden over)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.russian:
%affectedName% не впечатлен%surnameA% %partnerName%. Любое негативное взаимодействие станет в два раза сильнее!
(%seconds% секунд осталось)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.portuguese:
%affectedName% não está impressionado com %partnerName%. Qualquer interação negativa é duas vezes mais prejudicial! 
(%seconds% segundos restantes)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.chinese:
%affectedName% 没有对 %partnerName%有深刻的印象。任何坏的影响都是两倍效果。
(还剩%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.italian:
%affectedName% non è impressionat%OA% da %partnerName%. Ogni interazione negativa è due volte più dannosa!
(%seconds% secondi rimasti)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.turkish:
%affectedName% %partnerName% tarafından etkilenmedi. Herhangi bir olumsuz etkileşim iki kat daha zararlı!
(%seconds% saniye kaldı)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.japanese:
%affectedName%は%partnerName%に呆れました。関係が落下する効果は相互作用で2倍になります。
(残り%seconds%秒)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.czech:
%partnerName% neuděla%lA% dojem na %affectedName%. Jakákoli negativní interakce je dvakrát tak škodlivá!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.korean:
%affectedName%#{은} %partnerName%에게 감명받지 않았습니다. 부정적인 상호작용이 두배로 해롭게 작용합니다!
(%seconds% 초 남음)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.ukrainian:
%partnerName% меле якусь дичину, %affectedName% роздратован%heshe_IY_A%! Будь-які негативні взаємодії шкодять стосункам удвічі сильніше.
(Ще протягом %seconds% сек.)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.hungarian:
%partnerName% nem igazán nyűgözte le őt: %affectedName%. Minden negatív hatás kétszeresére nőtt!
(%seconds% másodperc van hátra)
